item.title: Mentioned by The Guardian Charlottetown
item.description:
Shea's shaming of Liberals over marijuana an attack from PMO, MPs say
On Monday morning, Shea released a statement slamming Charlottetown MP Sean Casey, Malpeque MP Wayne Easter and Cardigan MP Lawrence MacAulay for endorsing their leader Justin Trudeau's “reckless position” on pot legalization. She said she ...

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Pot stance puts Liberal's judgement up in smoke for Shea
Charlottetown Liberal MP Sean Casey said Trudeau had no choice but to answer the question, when he was asked. The other two Liberal MPs on P.E.I. — Cardigan MP Lawrence MacAulay and Malpeque MP Wayne Easter — also said they support their ...

item.title: Mentioned by The Guardian Charlottetown
item.description:
Canada not meeting trade targets: Easter
The most recent statistics on merchandise trade released by Statistics Canada confirm that Canada is still far from meeting its trade targets, says Malpeque MP Wayne Easter. Statistics Canada reported Tuesday the country's trade deficit narrowed to $469 ...

item.title: Mentioned by Daily Business Buzz
item.description:
PE: Shea pressured to release cabinet 'blacklists'
[CHARLOTTETOWN, PE] - Malpeque MP Wayne Easter is calling on federal Fisheries Minister Gail Shea to publicly release the names of anyone from P.E.I. on 'friend and enemy' lists requested by the prime minister's office. In an open letter to Shea posted ...
